roleset.name: to pronounce or speak
roleset.note: UTTER-V NOTES: Member of Vncls say-37.7. (from utter.01-v)

example.name: transitive
example.text: [Congress]-1 learned during the Reagan administration that it could intimidate the executive branch by [*-1]uttering again and again the same seven words : `` Provided , that no funds shall be spent [*-48] ... . ''
example.arg: the same seven words : `` Provided , that no funds shall be spent [*-48]

example.name: the hulk AND the illuminati-- score! Both args
example.text: [Some of the last words]-1 uttered *trace*-1 to him by the Hulk, setting Gamma Corps' sights on the members of the Illuminati, still rang fresh in his ears.
